about_the_game:
Fight or flee!

Not a moment's peace - evil is coming from everywhere and they have one target - to stop you. Wait, I think they're scared of… The letter “o”?! Go ahead, Sadko the singer!

The demo build will let you:

  • Unleash your "O" on the undead with a basic AI (just shooting and melee attacks).

  • Get the hang of resource gathering, building, and defending your base.

  • Use two active skills to maneuver better through crowds of enemies.

  • Pick up boosters from fallen foes to improve six hero stats and become even stronger.

How to play?

1. Point your mouse in the direction of the enemy to perform your attack, apply skills for greater effectiveness, and don't let Sadko's health drop to zero so you don't lose progress.

2. Help build a monument to the letter "O" that will banish evil from the land forever—find resources on the map for the construction and bring them to the site to kick off the defense phase.

3. Stay in the designated area until the timer runs out to successfully complete the defense phase.

4. Collect bonuses from defeated enemies to increase Sadko's characteristics to shoot faster, farther and stronger! 

It will take about 20 to 40 minutes to complete, and we hope it leaves you with only good vibes. Have fun playing!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A fusion of two contrasting genres Vampire-Like and Idle Tycoon in the setting of Folk tales of ancient Rus. Meditative gathering and spending of resources under dynamic music in a crowd of constantly advancing enemies.
